title: Hello. My pixel 3a started powering off and off. I wasn't able to do a reset. I am not currently liv
content:
Hello my Pixe 3A started turning on and off like crazy. I am currently our of the country so  I friend is doing me the favor of taking the phone to the Ufix store as the insructions in the support page ubreakifix store. the phone has warranty till today July 13th.  My friend took it to the Ubreakufix store just as the recomended steps in the page, the guy in the ubreakufix store are saying they are not authorized by google to look into this phone.Don't know what to do.
Phone IMEI 359677093975144
